result.eng: He's coming down from the stage.
result.ga: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitse
result.orig: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitse
result.html: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitseHe's coming down from the stage.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag teaċt anuas ón stáitseHe's coming down from the stage.

result.eng: Liam has been married for a year.
result.ga: Tá Liam pósta le bliain anuas
result.orig: Tá Liam pósta le bliain anuas
result.html: Tá Liam pósta le bliain anuasLiam has been married for a year.

result.eng: I've been in the city for ten years.
result.ga: Tá mé sa chathair le deich mbliana anuas
result.orig: Tá mé sa chathair le deich mbliana anuas
result.html: Tá mé sa chathair le deich mbliana anuasI've been in the city for ten years.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sa ċaṫair le deiċ mbliana anuasI've been in the city for ten years.

result.eng: They poured the soapy water on top of him.
result.ga: Doirteadh an t-uisce sobalach anuas air
result.orig: Doirteadh an t-uisce sobalach anuas air
result.html: Doirteadh an t-uisce sobalach anuas airThey poured the soapy water on top of him.
result.ponchtml: Doirteaḋ an t-uisce sobalaċ anuas airThey poured the soapy water on top of him.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.orig: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.html: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ponchtml: Tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
